pages.text: When you were in a Nether, you somehow came across an image. Whether it was a vision or you spotted an image of it while travelling through a structure, you can't recall, but you can recall what you saw. A Dark Altar, four pedestals, in front of a Nether Portal, with a Soul Sand, Netherrack, Bone and Rotten Flesh on the Pedestals and Sand on the Altar.
What you've made is some sort of odd sand. You feel ominous just by looking at it, and you feel that you should research more, before doing anything with it.
